facultyName: School of Medicine, Dentistry & Biomedical Sciences
description: This MSc in Clinical Anatomy aims to provide students with a greater understanding of advanced human anatomy including appropriate radiological anatomy, microscopic anatomy and embryology.The modules presented emphasise clinically and surgically relevant anatomy, although they are not designed exclusively for clinicians.Please note a deposit will be required to secure a place.
fees: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
